ygData.subject: Re: Killed a clockwork
ygData.msgSnippet: I was wrong, It is a Silvered Cylinder. Brillian ... From: Garett To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com Sent: Saturday, October 30, 1999 6:42 PM Subject: Re:
ygData.messageBody:
I was wrong, It is a Silvered Cylinder.

Brillian
----- Original Message -----
From: Garett
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Sent: Saturday, October 30, 1999 6:42 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Killed a clockwork


there is an enchanter quest in the new temple zone which calls for a silvered wand, which is supposed to be gotten from a silvered guard in the same temple. It could be the same thing though I am not sure.

cogg
----- Original Message -----
From: Brian Nelson
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Sent: Saturday, October 30, 1999 5:59 PM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Killed a clockwork


I was with a couple of friends yesterday who are level 50. They were bored so I suggested going to kill a clockwork spider in Ak'Anon. We all went in and they ended up killing Clockwork XIIC (a spider). It was blue to both of them. Loot that came from the spider was a C series blackbox (Which I believe is part of a warrior quest), and a Silvered Rod which is a lore item. Does anyone know what this silvered rod is for?

Brillian
